title: Rebound Battleaxe
content:
ound Battleaxe

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing

Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and Attack Rolls.

It's All In The Wrists: This weapon has the Thrown property and deals an additional 1d4 Thunder damage when thrown.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

This axe is so loyal, it will sometimes return to wielders it favours.

Battleaxe Versatile

Rebound Battleaxe is one of the Battleaxe Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Reb
